column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////Expect at least a short wait even on a week night after 7. The space isn't very big. I like the chicken wonton ramen and the creamy vegetarian. I hate the big community tables. Even though I know this is common. I've had people rudely tell me how to use chopsticks when I didn't ask. Like the food
column2: not thrilled with the atmosphere. Maybe I'll start ordering carry out
